name: Oktara
description:
Oktara is an outsourcing software development company. Our technical expertise includes Java, PHP, .NET, Android, iPhone among others, to guarantee our clients the best and latest technologies in the market. We invite you to know more about us, as we are sure we can help your business to grow being your software development partner.
Oktara is a proud partner of Proximity Group, an organization of specialized technology companies in Costa Rica focused on providing nearshore technology services.
